name: 3076 3D
description:
Solve how to reach 3076 points!
Swipe, pull and push numbers in three dimensions!

The play area is a cube whose eight corners can hold a number or be empty. You get points by combining a pair of numbers that are equal.
You can do this by moving numbers from one side of the cube to the opposite side. A number moves if the opposite corner is empty or contains the same number. If the numbers are the same they combine to the number that is the sum of the two numbers.

Features
- one step undo
- sounds
- High Score list
- accessible with VoiceOver
